item.title: In-game highscores problem![317]
item.dc:creator: @nikkisere nikkisere
item.description:
@nikkisere wrote:

in my server, the in-game highscores only shows 1name? which is the highest level person on at the time, and if there is 2 of the same level- it variates between the two.

how can i get to show all players names?

this is what the ‘in-game highscores.java’ says:

public class InGameHighscores implements Comparable { 
String name = "";
public static String type = "";
int score = 0;

public InGameHighscores(String name, int score) {
    this.name = name;
    this.score = score;
}

@Override
public String toString() {
    return String.format("%s @or1@- %s: @gre@%d",name,type,score);
}

public int compareTo(Object o1) {
    if (this.score == ((InGameHighscores) o1).score) {
        return 0;
    } else if ((this.score) > ((InGameHighscores) o1).score) {
        return 1;
    } else {
        return -1;
    }
}

}

Read full topic
